lead_paragraph: Bruce Chargo was partially paralyzed in a childhood accident and now uses special controls to drive. But he doesn’t drive just any car. His wheels are a Hemi-powered 1958 Dodge Power Wagon.
snippet: Bruce Chargo was partially paralyzed in a childhood accident and now uses special controls to drive. But he doesn’t drive just any car. His wheels are a Hemi-powered 1958 Dodge Power Wagon....
abstract: Bruce Chargo, who was partially paralyzed in childhood accident, uses special controls to drive modified 1958 Dodge Power Wagon.

headline.main: Returning to the Road, in Style and With Help
headline.seo: Returning to the Road, in Style and With Help
headline.print_headline: Returning to the Road, In Style and With Help
